sentences.sentence: She just flutters her eyelashes and the men come running!
sentences.translation: 她只要眨一下眼睫毛，男人们便忙不迭地跑过来！

sentences.sentence: In the early seventies I wore false eyelashes, as was the fashion.
sentences.translation: 70年代初我戴假睫毛，那是当时的时尚。

sentences.sentence: Snowflakes that stay on my nose and eyelashes.
sentences.translation: 雪花片片落在鼻尖，落在睫毛上。
